channel.title: Only my client can connect
channel.description: How do I make it to where any client can connect besides hacking clients?

item.title: Only my client can connect
item.dc:creator: @demps2k9 demps2k9
item.description:
@demps2k9 wrote:

Open up your client files. Search for Client.java or Gui.java and search server ip.
It will come up with something like this: server ip “”; or server ip “127.0.0.1”;
Put your server ip in between “” and compile. After that reload your client and connect.

If you still cannot connect search 43594 and 5555 in your client.java. Make sure it says port 43594 though so it can connect to your server. If it still doesn’t work go into your server files and search 5555 until your come to something that says something about ports and change it to 43594.

Read full topic
